name: Torr
background: An exiled blacksmith from the Forge-Cities of the Iron Peaks. He aims to craft a legendary weapon to defeat the Order and joins after Rya recovers stolen clan relics.
narrative_hook: The Champions of Order have stolen relics from Torr's clan, which the party must recover. His crafting skills can be used to repair or upgrade the party's gear throughout the campaign.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Torr's Armadillian heritage and his peerless armor. It turns him into a true bastion of defense, absorbing immense punishment, controlling the battlefield, and punishing foes who dare to strike him.

talents.name: Stone Guard
talents.effect: As a major action, gain a +3 bonus to your Damage Reduction for 1 round.

talents.name: Defensive Curl
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can curl into a defensive ball. You gain an additional +2 bonus to Damage Reduction, but your movement speed is reduced to 0 for 1 round.

talents.name: Spiked Rebuke (Passive)
talents.effect: Your armor is fitted with defensive spikes. Whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, they take physical damage equal to your Might attribute.

talents.name: Ricochet Shell
talents.effect: As a reaction when you are missed by a ranged physical attack, you can angle your armor to deflect the shot. Force the attacker to re-roll their attack against a different enemy within 10 feet of you. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Rolling Charge
talents.effect: As a major action, you can curl into a ball and move up to your full movement speed in a straight line. Any enemy you move through must make an Agility DC 14 check or be knocked prone and take 2d8 bludgeoning damage. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Goading Challenge
talents.effect: As a major action, you bang your hammer against your shell, forcing all enemies in a 15-foot cone to make a Spirit DC 14 check or have disadvantage on attack rolls that do not target you for 1 round. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Living Fortress (Passive)
talents.effect: Your presence on the battlefield is a bastion of safety. Adjacent allies are considered to have half cover, granting them a +1 bonus to their defensive rolls.

talents.name: Unbreakable
talents.effect: Once per combat, when you would take damage, you can use your Reaction to reduce that damage to 0.

talents.name: Juggernaut's Rebuke (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you adopt a legendary defensive stance for 3 rounds. Your movement speed becomes 0, you gain resistance to all damage, and any enemy that deals damage to you takes half of that damage in return. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

playstyles.description: This path highlights Torr's legendary skill as a blacksmith. He uses powerful, precise hammer blows to sunder armor and can use the heat of the forge to temporarily enhance his allies' weapons and armor in the heat of battle.

talents.name: Hammer Swing
talents.effect: A powerful melee attack that deals 2d10 bludgeoning damage.

talents.name: Forge Fire
talents.effect: Once per day, as a bonus action, you can superheat your weapon, dealing an additional 1d6 fire damage on your next successful attack.

talents.name: Sunder Armor (Modifies Hammer Swing)
talents.effect: When you hit a target with Hammer Swing, their Damage Reduction is reduced by 2 for 1 round.

talents.name: Field Temper
talents.effect: As a major action, you can strike an ally's weapon with a refining hammer blow. For the next 3 rounds, that weapon deals an additional +2 damage. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Seismic Slam
talents.effect: As a major action, you slam your hammer into the ground, creating a shockwave. All enemies in a 15-foot cone take 3d8 bludgeoning damage and must make a Might DC 14 check or be 'Stunned' for 1 round. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Masterwork Reinforcement
talents.effect: As a major action, you can apply a rapid-forged patch to an ally's armor, granting them temporary Vitality equal to twice your Mind attribute. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Rune of Warding
talents.effect: As a major action, you can etch a temporary rune onto an ally's armor or shield. Choose Fire, Ice, or Lightning; the ally gains resistance to that damage type for the duration of the combat. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Shattering Blow
talents.effect: You make a single, devastating melee attack that deals 3d12 bludgeoning damage. If the target is using a shield, the shield is destroyed. If not, their armor is damaged, and their base Damage Reduction is permanently halved (until repaired). This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Forge of Legends (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you unleash the ultimate smithing secret. For 3 rounds, the weapons of all allies within 30 feet are wreathed in flame and emit a heroic aura. All their weapon attacks deal an additional 1d10 fire damage and are considered magical. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.
